logs.step1_raw_spec:
Here is the pseudocode specification:

```
FUNCTION separate_vowels_and_consonants(input_string)
    DECLARE vowel_chars AS A STRING
    DECLARE consonant_chars AS A STRING
    DECLARE vowels AS A STRING "aeiouAEIOU"
    
    FOR EACH CHARACTER in input_string:
        IF character is in vowels THEN
            ADD character to vowel_chars
        ELSE
            ADD character to consonant_chars
        END IF
        
    RETURN concatenated string of vowel_chars + consonant_chars
```

logs.step1_raw_spec:
Here is the pseudocode specification:

```pseudocode
define function separate_vowels_and_consonants(input_string)
    declare vowel_chars as a character array
    declare consonant_chars as a character array
    define vowels as "aeiouAEIOU"
    
    for each character in input_string:
        if character is in vowels:
            add character to vowel_chars
        else:
            add character to consonant_chars
            
    return concatenated string of vowel_chars and consonant_chars
```
